title: PJ PAUL JONES Men's Shiny Satin Dress Shirts Long Sleeve Button Down Silk Shirt with Bow Tie
description: Premium Silk-like Material: Mens Satin Shirt offers a luxurious feel and an elegant sheen. The smooth, comfortable fabric mimics the look and feel of real silk, light and drapey, making it perfect for sophisticated statements at any event

Versatile Occasions: Mens Silk Shirt is ideal for wedding, party, night out, club, Mardi Gras, carnival, date, prom, dance, ball, disco, graduation, concert, Halloween, Christmas,etc. It designed to turn heads and make you the center of attention

Fashion Look: Paired with bell bottom or sequin clothing, Mens 70s Shirt is perfect for disco themed events, it ensures you capture the retro vibe while staying contemporary; paired with bow tie and blazer, Mens Long Sleeve Button Down Shirts transforms into a stylish tuxedo shirt, suitable for formal occasions

Best Gift: Mens Shiny Disco Shirt has the right amount of flash and silk look, it is surely an eye catcher, a perfect gift for everyone in your list on Valentine's Day, Father's Day, birthday, anniversary, or any holidays

Size Note: PLEASE REFER TO OUR SIZE CHART FOR ACCURATE FITTING; model is wearing size Medium, height 6'1", weight 180 lbs, showcasing the perfect fit. Mens satin shirt is not elastic, please choose your size accordingly for the best fit
